Requirement (from spec / assignment): Lockout after 3 consecutive failed login attempts; subsequent attempts blocked for ≥ 1 minute.
Enforce strong password policy (e.g., minimum 12 chars or passphrase rules per spec).
Notes: Rejects too-short or illegal characters per CLI rules

Requirement (from spec / assignment): Admin must NOT be able to read users’ Confidential Information (CI); privilege separation.
Notes: Expect denial or redaction of CI for admin

Requirement (from spec / assignment): Robust input validation; block injection and path traversal on commands (e.g., EXD/IMD).
Notes: Reject export to ../../ or absolute paths

Requirement (from spec / assignment): Sensitive data not stored in plaintext at rest; appropriate file permissions.
Notes: Search for unique marker not found in data files

Requirement (from spec / assignment): Errors/logs must not leak secrets (passwords, CI).
Notes: Check error messages and log files

Requirement (from spec / assignment): Graceful handling of large/malformed inputs (DoS bounds).
Session hygiene: tokens/credentials invalid after logout; expiry enforced if applicable.
Notes: If ABA implements sessions; else mark N/A
